${query.where}

SELECT id as tableId, business_id as appId, dimension_tab_name AS tableName, del_flag as tableType, create_time FROM tb_dimension WHERE is_publish = 1 AND del_flag = 1 and business_id=${query.appId} and dimension_tab_name like CONCAT('%',#{query.keyword},'%') union all SELECT id as tableId, business_id as appId, fact_tab_name AS tableName, del_flag+1 as tableType, create_time FROM tb_fact WHERE is_publish = 1 AND del_flag = 1 and business_id=${query.appId} and fact_tab_name like CONCAT('%',#{query.keyword},'%')
